text: læa chen nan hæla phracea khxng cea thrng leuxk cea læa thrng sxn cea hı ru wicha thanay fan læa thrng hı smburn sung khwam pordpran khxng phraxngkh kæ cea læa kæ wngswan khxng yaxˌ kub chen deiyw kab thi phraxngkh di thrng hı smburn sung khwam pordpran kæ pu thang sxng khxng cea tæ kxn khux xi brxhim læa xis hak thæcring phracea khxng cea pen phuthrng rxbru phuthrng pricha yan
